name: Magical Girl's Bullet Hell v0.2
description:
Ella lived with her parents and older brother on the outskirts of town. When she wasn't learning how to hunt, she could be found exploring the mysterious ruins that sat on the border of their kingdom with her brother. He was admired for his charm and uncanny resemblance to the royal prince.

One day after finding a magic fairy in the ruins, a witch appeared before them and took her brother, mistaking him for the royal prince.

Ella must use the power given to her by the mysterious fairy to defeat the witch's minions, including corrupted creatures and deities to save her brother.

CONTROLS
Use the Arrow Keys to Move

Hold the Z Key to fire Ella's special bullets

Use the Esc Key to pause

NOTES

The game ends when the boss is defeated.  The cutscene was bugged, so there is nothing after it.  I apologize for the lack of an end-level summary.  It will be resolved in the next update (next week Saturday)
